itunes:title: Episode 957 - Special Guest Congressional Candidate Joe Kent
title: Episode 957 - Special Guest Congressional Candidate Joe Kent
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Joe Kent, a former Green Beret and a current Republican candidate for Washington state’s third congressional district (WA-3), joins the show to discuss the importance of school choice and tying funding to students, why and how he hopes to impeach Joe Bid...
itunes:summary:
Joe Kent, a former Green Beret and a current Republican candidate for Washington state’s third congressional district (WA-3), joins the show to discuss the importance of school choice and tying funding to students, why and how he hopes to impeach Joe Biden once elected, getting Trump’s endorsement, and why he is fighting against both the far left and the establishment GOP.
